titleStmt.title: Homelies sette forth by the righte reuerende father in God, Edmunde Byshop of London, not onely promised before in his booke, intituled, A necessary doctrine, but also now of late adioyned, and added thereunto, to be read within his diocesse of London, of all persons, vycars, and curates, vnto theyr parishioners, vpon sondayes, & holydayes.
titleStmt.author: Bonner, Edmund, 1500?-1569.

titleStmt.title: Homelies sette forth by the righte reuerende father in God, Edmunde Byshop of London, not onely promised before in his booke, intituled, A necessary doctrine, but also now of late adioyned, and added thereunto, to be read within his diocesse of London, of all persons, vycars, and curates, vnto theyr parishioners, vpon sondayes, & holydayes.
titleStmt.author: Bonner, Edmund, 1500?-1569.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Ihon Cawodde, Prynter to the Kyng and Queenes Maiesties,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprinted at London in Poules churcheyarde, at the sygne of the holy Ghost, :

notesStmt.note: Title within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 83 with printer's mark of John Cawood in sill); historiated initials.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
